name: Cosmic Rain
description:
Make a Match 3 with the spooky blobs from the Cosmic Rain™ raining from above and obtain his powers to protect the cauldron!

Very early alpha build!!! lots of bugs and lots of fixes to go

This early version is lacking in many things such as:

-1/3 spooky blob power (only the red one for now) 

-Only one spooky monster (many more in the future)

-1 player (2 as a option is the plan for the future)

-0/1 special blob (soon™)

We will be keeping a very frequent update schedule and have a full version in december to be sold here, itch.io, steam, gog and so on

to do list for the next update:

-all the 3 colored blob powers

- 1 more monster

 - 1 new music.

CONTROLS (subject to change in the future)

- WASD - Move

- ENTER - Grab blob

- E - Use power
